name: Wizard Defense (SC37Games)
description:
Wizard Defense is a game I created in Year 2 of University, based around the theme of 'Survival'.

You have to survive waves of enemies by defeating them with the wizard's weapon of choice: magic spells. Each spell has randomised stats like power, speed, and range, and they can even have special effects like burning the foe, or draining their health!

But that's not all! You can also buy magic potions in the shop. They give you special effects too, but you can activate them at any time! 

With thousands of different spells, and different items available in the shop each time you play, no two playthroughs are the same!
